meanings.definition: A taste sensation that is meaty or savory
meanings.sent1: The umami of the broth made it rich and flavorful.
meanings.sent2: The chef added soy sauce to enhance the umami of the dish.
meanings.sent3: The umami in the burger was so delicious, it made me want another one!
meanings.sent4: The umami of the stew enveloped my taste buds like a warm blanket.
meanings.sent5: The umami of the grilled mushrooms was unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The fifth basic taste, along with sweet, sour, bitter, and salty
meanings.sent1: She could taste the umami of the miso soup on her tongue.
meanings.sent2: The umami in the marinade balanced out the sweetness of the sauce.
meanings.sent3: The umami of the cheese was so strong, it almost overpowered the other flavors!
meanings.sent4: The umami of the dish lingered in my mouth long after I finished eating.
meanings.sent5: The umami of the ripe tomatoes was a pleasant surprise.
